comments:
Pre: Method Composer is not running

Scenario:
1/ I have changed our SVN structure remotely in a way that the library is now in different sub-folder
2/ I have checked out the current repository revision (and so the location of the library has been changed)
3/ Start MC

Currnet result: the tool doesn't start; it gets stuck.

Expected result: the tool starts and a message says: "Unable to open the last opened method library."

!ENTRY org.eclipse.epf.library 2 0 2007-08-10 14:04:23.926
!MESSAGE Unable to open the last opened method library 'file:/C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/smirarom/My%20Documents/My%20Projects/PCC/!SVN/docs/sc/configuration/OpenUP/'.

When RPF loads a library, it asks the Eclipse to refresh the workspace, and all related files. This may trigger the Eclipse's team API try to talk with the SVN server, thus causing the problem.

But there is no close integration between EPF and Eclipse resource manager, i.e EPF is not notified of those errors.

No plan to fix. 

Workaroung: delete all those SVN system files from the library.
Closed as no plan to fix.

traces.message: The project description file (.project) for 'OpenUP' is missing.  This file contains important information about the project.  The project will not function properly until this file is restored.
